description: Enables the process of sending Amazon Simple Notification Service (SNS) notifications about a specified event to a specified SNS topic.

parameters.name: resourceArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the assessment template that is used during the event for which you want to receive SNS notifications.

parameters.name: event
parameters.description: The event for which you want to receive SNS notifications.

parameters.name: topicArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the SNS topic to which the SNS notifications are sent.
